channel.title: PI server doesnt have npc drops?
channel.description:
[code]java.util.NoSuchElementException: No line found at java.util.Scanner.nextLine(Scanner.java:1585) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.loadDrops(NPCDrops.java:37) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init>(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:64)[/code]
that shows in my run.bat
wondering what exactly this means? why isnt my npcs dropping items?

item.title: PI server doesnt have npc drops?
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Maybe your npcdrops is located somewhere else?

But i think you have to look to what the compiler says.
Like server.java:64

Go to ur server.java ctrl+g then search 64
And post the line here maybe it will help

Read full topic
item.source: PI server doesnt have npc drops?
